name: abscli

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (abs ` c0)∈ ℝ
⊣ c0 ∈ ℂ
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(abs ` c0)∈ ℝ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (abs ` c0)∈ ℝ
⊣ c0 ∈ ℂ
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(abs ` c0)∈ ℝ)

comment: Real closure of absolute value. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1999.)
